amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of section 317 of the Communications Act of 1934 (47 U.S.C. 317).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 54 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit funds from being used in contravention of Section 317 of the Communications Act of 1934.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yarmuth amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 232 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yarmuth amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 232 (Roll no. 394).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Yarmuth.
